definition: steps consisting of two parallel members connected by rungs, come unraveled or undone as if by snagging
details:
noun
- steps consisting of two parallel members connected by rungs
- a row of unravelled stitches
= synonyms: run
- ascending stages by which somebody or something can progress
= example: ascending stages by which somebody or something can progress
verb
- come unraveled or undone as if by snagging
= synonyms: run
